mapper.select:
select count(*) from tblAWC awc join vwAttractionList al on awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCWin w on w.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCFinalWin fw on fw.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq
where name like '%' || #{word} || '%' or info like '%' || #{word} || '%' or restriction like '%' || #{word} || '%'

select count(*) from tblAWC awc join vwAttractionList al on awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCWin w on w.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCFinalWin fw on fw.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq where awc.is_test = 'Y'

select al.*, awc.is_test, w.awc_match_count, w.awc_win_count, fw.awc_final_win_count from vwAttractionList al join tblAWC awc on awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCWin w on w.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCFinalWin fw on fw.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq where awc.is_test = 'Y'
select sum(awc_final_win_count) as total_awc_final_win_count from tblAWCFinalWin
mapper.insert: insert into tblAWC (awc_seq, is_test, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAWC.NEXTVAL, 'Y', #{attraction_seq})
insert into tblAWCWin (awc_win_seq, awc_match_count, awc_win_count, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAWCWin.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, #{attraction_seq})
insert into tblAWCFinalWin (awc_final_win_seq, awc_final_win_count, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAWCFinalWin.NEXTVAL, 0, #{attraction_seq})
mapper.update: update tblAWCWin set awc_match_count = awc_match_count + 1 where attraction_seq = #{attractionSeq}
update tblAWCWin set awc_win_count = awc_win_count + 1 where attraction_seq = #{attractionSeq}
update tblAWCFinalWin set awc_final_win_count = awc_final_win_count + 1 where attraction_seq = #{attractionSeq}
mapper.select: select attraction_seq, name from tblAttraction order by attraction_seq

select t.*, to_char(t.win_rate * 100, '999.99') as win_rate_per, to_char(t.final_win_rate * 100, '999.99') as final_win_rate_per from ( select al.attraction_seq, al.name, al.info, al.img, w.awc_match_count as match_count, w.awc_win_count as win_count, fw.awc_final_win_count as final_win_count, (w.awc_win_count / w.awc_match_count) as win_rate, (fw.awc_final_win_count / total_final_win_count) as final_win_rate, ROWNUM as rnum from vwAttractionList al join tblAWC awc on awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCWin w on w.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCFinalWin fw on fw.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq cross join ( select SUM(awc_final_win_count) as total_final_win_count from tblAWCFinalWin ) where awc.is_test = 'Y' order by win_rate desc, final_win_rate desc ) t where t.rnum <= 3
